column4: Anybody have any experience with Ralink RT3070 drivers on Ubuntu 10.04 Lucid by any chance? ?
how did you compile the module?
don't run make as sudo (not your problem, just a recommendation)
and there were no errors during compilation?
i'm certainly no expert, it sounds like maybe you compiled against the wrong kernel headers or something (total guess)
you could try 7zip or UniExtract to get the good stuff out
in the panel, the little network dealy
i have even rebooted to see if that was the issue
not sure.  check if the wireless is in the /etc/network/interfaces file, if so, comment it out
yea its not in that file
